thread.title: Breathtaking waterfall views from bridges around the world
thread.title_full: Breathtaking waterfall views from bridges around the world | Fox News

author: Nick Mafi
title: Breathtaking waterfall views from bridges around the world
text:
By Nick Mafi
Published September 11, 2015 Email Print ImageBroker/Alamy
Simon Phelps Photography/Getty Images
WIN-Initiative/Getty Images
AFLO CO LTD/Alamy
Ian Dagnall/Alamy
SPANI Arnaud/Hemis/Corbis
Previous Next Waterfalls are among nature’s most spectacular sights. Architectural Digest rounds up stunning bridges across the globe that bring us closer to the action.
1. Footbridge amid the falls ImageBroker/Alamy
A footbridge snakes toward Iguazu Falls, on the border of Brazil and Argentina.
2. Victoria Falls Bridge Simon Phelps Photography/Getty Images
Victoria Falls Bridge, Victoria Falls, on the border of Zambia and Zimbabwe.
3. Låtefossen Waterfall Footbridge WIN-Initiative/Getty Images
Footbridge near the base of Låtefossen Waterfalls, Latefossen, Norway.
4. Otari Village, Nagano, Japan AFLO CO LTD/Alamy
Footbridge overlooking a waterfall in Otari Village, Nagano, Japan.
5. In the midst of Multnomah Falls Ian Dagnall/Alamy
A walkway bridge offers views of Multnomah Falls, Columbia River Gorge, Oregon.
6. Plitvice Lakes National Park, Croatia SPANI Arnaud/Hemis/Corbis
A snaking footpath in this UNESCO World Heritage site allows viewers to get close to the many waterfalls in Plitvice Lakes National Park, Croatia.
Check out more stunning bridges around the world.
